title: If you could give any champion any skin copyright or not
body:
What would it be, and who would it be for?

I would love a Solaire leona skin.

I can see it now, at spawn appears from letters spelling her name on the ground in the classic sunbro manner.

Joke could be along the lines of: "lets us work together in jolly cooperation!"

taunt could be: "if i didnt know any better id say you have a thing for me"

what are your ideas?
